titles.title: We Bow At Your Feet Lord Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We bow at your feet, Lord Jesus
In humble adoration.
Redeem the time that we have lost
From your presence in worship we pray

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Restore in us your temple
With fire and holy fear
For the time has come to reveal your Son
In the hearts of a chosen people.
